p: In another study, there was a reduction of the increased cardiac index and the duration of acute lung injury with the intravenous supplementation (every 8 h/10 days) with 70 mg/kg NAC or 62 mg/kg 2-oxothiazolidine-4-carboxylate, a prodrug of cysteine (OTZ-procysteine). However, mortality was not modified by NAC or OTZ supplementation. Duration of acute lung injury might be shortened by this type of therapy [ 101, 102].
